summary: (DSG AUTOMATIC) HARSH SHIFTING FROM PARK TO REVERSE, AND FROM REVERSE TO DRIVE. HESITATION FROM A STOP TO GO. CAR FEELS LIKE IT SHUDDERS OR JERKS FROM A STOP TO GO, AND WHEN BRAKING TO A STOP. DEALER STATES IT'S A FAULTY MECHATRONICS UNIT AND NEEDS TO BE REPLACED. SAME ISSUES THAT PLAGUED THE LAST GENERATION OF VEHICLES, AND VW WAS FORCED TO ISSUE A RECALL DUE TO SAFETY CONCERNS. DEALER TRIED TO GET VW TO COVER COST OF REPAIR, BUT THEY REFUSED. DEALER WANTS $2500 TO REPAIR. VEHICLE CURRENTLY HAS 47,346 MILES. CURRENTLY DISCUSSING LEGAL ACTION WITH AN ATTORNEY.  *TR
